content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of 
- Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0), 
- Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0), 
- Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0), 
- Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0), 
- Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) and 
- Multiple chests at positions (x=43.5, y=-82.5), (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of 
- Lab (position x=2.5, y=0.5), 
- Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5), 
- Chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5), 
- Small electric pole (position x=2.5, y=1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before starting the mining operation
- Make sure the burner mining drill is connected to a chest to store the mined resources

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting operation
- Make sure the furnace result is not full before starting the smelting operation

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has fuel before starting the operation
- Make sure the boiler is connected to a steam engine to utilize the generated steam

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe to transport the pumped fluid
- Make sure the offshore pump has a valid fluid system to operate

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine has a valid input liquid before starting the operation
- Make sure the steam engine is connected to a pipe to transport the generated power
